description:
The gang finds a perfect babysitter for their creatures. From there,  Mii-kun sets out on an unintended adventure.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atarashii Toko Fushigi na Toko Fushigi na Tomodachi
New Places, Strange Places, Strange Friends
あたらしいとこふしぎなとこふしぎな友だち
새로운 곳 이상한 곳 이상한 친구들
